mapper.select: SELECT OP_ELAPSED_TIME, AVG_SQL_ELAPSED_SECONDS, USERNAME, OPNAME, TARGET, UNITS, MESSAGE, SQL_ADDRESS, SQL_HASH_VALUE, CHECK_YMD, CHECK_SEQ + ROWNO AS CHECK_SEQ, START_TIME, END_TIME FROM ( SELECT /*TRUNC((elapsed_seconds + TIME_REMAINING) / 60, 0) || ':' || MOD(elapsed_seconds + TIME_REMAINING, 60) AS OP_ELAPSED_TIME,*/ elapsed_seconds + TIME_REMAINING AS OP_ELAPSED_TIME, ROUND((ELAPSED_TIME / EXECUTIONS / 1000000), 2) AS AVG_SQL_ELAPSED_SECONDS, USERNAME, OPNAME, TARGET, UNITS, MESSAGE, A.SQL_ADDRESS, A.SQL_HASH_VALUE, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1/24/6, 'HH24:MI') AS START_TIME, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI') AS END_TIME, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS CHECK_YMD, NVL( (SELECT MAX(CHECK_SEQ) FROM TCKLOQ WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')), 0) AS CHECK_SEQ, ROWNUM AS ROWNO FROM v$session_longops A, V$SQL B WHERE A.sql_address = B.ADDRESS AND A.SQL_HASH_VALUE = B.HASH_VALUE AND B.EXECUTIONS <> 0 AND B.CHILD_NUMBER = 0 --AND to_date(LAST_LOAD_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd/hh24:mi:ss') > (sysdate - 1/24/6) AND LAST_UPDATE_TIME > (sysdate - 1/24) AND USERNAME IN ('SOSS_USR', 'SPS_USR', 'EDI_USR') --AND (SOFAR/TOTALWORK) * 100 < 100 ORDER BY A.elapsed_seconds DESC, A.START_TIME DESC )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCKLOQ ( CHECK_YMD, CHECK_SEQ, CHECK_START_TIME, CHECK_END_TIME, OP_ELAPSED_TIME, AVG_SQL_ELAPSED_SECONDS, USERNAME, TARGET, UNITS, MESSAGE, SQL ) VALUES ( #{CHECK_YMD}, #{CHECK_SEQ}, #{START_TIME}, #{END_TIME}, #{OP_ELAPSED_TIME}, #{AVG_SQL_ELAPSED_SECONDS}, #{USERNAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TARGET, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UNITS}, #{MESSAGE}, #{SQL} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM TCKLOQ WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT CHECK_YMD, CHECK_SEQ, CHECK_START_TIME, CHECK_END_TIME, OP_ELAPSED_TIME, AVG_SQL_ELAPSED_SECONDS, USERNAME, TARGET, UNITS, MESSAGE, SQL FROM (SELECT CHECK_YMD, CHECK_SEQ, CHECK_START_TIME, CHECK_END_TIME, OP_ELAPSED_TIME, AVG_SQL_ELAPSED_SECONDS, USERNAME, TARGET, UNITS, MESSAGE, SQL, ROWNUM AS ROW_NO FROM TCKLOQ WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
WHERE ROW_NO BETWEEN ((#{page}-1) * #{rows}) + 1 AND (#{page} * #{rows})

SELECT IFNULL(NULLIF(ELAPSED_TIME, ''), 0) AS ELAPSED_TIME, SQL_ID, LAST_LOAD_YMD, LAST_LOAD_TIME, DB_NAME, SQL_FULLTEXT FROM (SELECT ELAPSED_TIME, SQL_ID, LAST_LOAD_YMD, LAST_LOAD_TIME, DB_NAME, SQL_FULLTEXT FROM TCKLOQ WHERE DB_NAME = #{system} AND LAST_LOAD_YMD = date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d')) TCKLOQ ORDER BY LAST_LOAD_TIME
